text: This is a list of notable Turkish philosophers and scholars . ==A== * Ahmed Resmî Efendi, historian and diplomat * Ahmet Cevdet Pasha, sociologist, legist and historian * Ali Akansu – Electrical engineer * Ismail Akbay – Engineer * Selman Akbulut, mathematician * Janet Akyüz Mattei, astronomer * Alev Alatlı, economist * Ahmet Alkan, economist * Cahit Arf, mathematician * Oruç Aruoba, poet, philosopher * Aşıkpaşazade, historian * Ayten Aydın, civil engineer and anthropologist * Aziz Sancar, biochemist, molecular biologist and Nobel laureate in Chemistry ==B== * Aykut Barka, earth scientist * Asım Orhan Barut, University of Colorado-Boulder physicistAsim Orhan Barut * Turhan Baytop, botanist * Hulusi Behçet, dermatologist, physician and scientist * Orkut Büyükkökten, software engineer ==C== * Katip Çelebi, historian, philosopher and geographer * Tantek Çelik, computer scientist * Erhan Çinlar, probabilist ==D== * Hilmi Volkan Demir, scientist * Arda Denkel, philosopher ==E== * Gelenbevi Ismail Efendi, mathematician * Yunus Emre, poet, mystic and philosopher * Osman Nuri Eralp, veterinary scientist and microbiologist * Ali Erdemir, scientist * Elza Erkip * Ayşe Erzan, theoretical physicist * İbrahim Hakkı Erzurumi, philosopher and mystic ==F== * Molla Şemseddin Fenari, logician, Islamic theologian ==G== * Erol Gelenbe, Computer scientist * Nüzhet Gökdoğan, astronomer and mathematician * Feza Gürsey, mathematician and physicist ==I== * Masatoshi Gündüz Ikeda, Mathematician * Ataç İmamoğlu, physicist * Erdal İnönü, Physicist, politician * Ahmet Mete Işıkara (1941-2013), seismologist ==K== * İhsan Ketin (1914-1995], geologist * Behram Kurşunoğlu (1922-2003), physicist * Ioanna Kuçuradi (1936- ), Professor of Philosophy, President of Turkish Philosophy Association * Yalçın Küçük, economist, historian and sovietolog ==M== * Taqi al-Din Muhammad ibn Ma'ruf - Ottoman polymath * Ahmed Dede Müneccimbaşi, astronomer, astrologer and historian * Mustafa Âlî, historian * Silahdar Findiklili Mehmed Aga, historian * Mehmet Öz, scientist, surgeon and author * Takiyettin Mengüşoğlu, philosopher ==N== * Mustafa Naima, historian * Matrakçı Nasuh, mathematician, historian, geographer, cartographer, swordmaster, and miniaturist * Leyla Neyzi, anthropologist, sociologist and historian ==O== * Hakkı Ögelman, physicist and astrophysicist ==P== * İbrahim Peçevi, historian * Kadrî of Pergamon, linguist ==Q== * Ali Qushji, astronomer, mathematician, physicist and scientist ==R== * Kemal Reis, cartographer * Piri Reis, Ottoman cartographer and admiral * Seydi Ali Reis, cartographer ==S== * Şerafeddin Sabuncuoğlu, physician * Gülsün Sağlamer, architect * Muzafer Sherif, social psychologist * Hoca Sadeddin Efendi, historian * Aziz Sancar, biochemist * Aydın Sayılı - title: List of Turkish philosophers and scientists
